00051 TREX::witre::WitreApplication *TREX::witre::createWitre(Wt::WEnvironment const &e, WitreServer* Server) {
00052       WitreApplication *app = new WitreApplication(e,Server);
00053       // hard coded for now
00054 
00055       bool found;
00056       std::string file = s_log->use("witre_loc.xml", found);
00057 
00058       if( found ) {
00059             file.erase(file.end()-4, file.end());
00060             s_log->syslog("witre")<<"set locale to "<<file;
00061             app->messageResourceBundle().use(file);
00062       } else {
00063             s_log->syslog("witre")<<"Did not find locale "<<file;
00064       }
00065 
00066       return app;
00067 }

00070 WitreApplication::WitreApplication(Wt::WEnvironment const &env, WitreServer* Server)
00071   :Wt::WApplication(env) {
00072     wServer = Server;
00073     wServer->connect(this, boost::bind(&WitreApplication::post, this));
00074     enableUpdates(true);
00075 
00076     setTitle("Witre - trex "+TREX::version::str());
00077     //root()->addWidget(new Wt::WText(Wt::WString::tr("test")));
00078 
00079     //setCssTheme("Polished");
00080 
00081     //clock = new Wt::WText("",root());
00082     new Wt::WText("Current ",root());
00083     tickNum = new Wt::WText("Tick Value: 0", root());
00084     tickNum->setMargin(5,Wt::Right);
00085     new Wt::WBreak(root());
00086 
00087     Wt::WGroupBox *tLines = new Wt::WGroupBox("Available Timelines", root());
00088     for(int i = 0; i<wServer->extTimelinesSize(); i++)
00089     {
00090         std::string name = wServer->extTimelinesName(i);
00091         tLineMap[name]=true;
00092         Wt::WCheckBox* temp = new Wt::WCheckBox(name, tLines);
00093         temp->setChecked(true);//
00094         temp->setObjectName(name);
00095         temp->changed().connect(this, &WitreApplication::timeLineChange);
00096     }
00097     menu = new Wt::WComboBox(root());
00098     for(int i = 0; i<wServer->extTimelinesSize(); i++)
00099     {
00100         std::string name = wServer->extTimelinesName(i);
00101         if(wServer->acceptsGoal(wServer->extTimelinesName(i)))
00102         {
00103             menu->addItem(name);
00104         }
00105     }
00106     input= new Wt::WLineEdit(root());
00107     input->setMargin(5, Wt::Left);
00108     enter = new Wt::WPushButton("Post Goal", root());
00109     enter->setMargin(5,Wt::Left);
00110     enter->clicked().connect(this, &WitreApplication::attributePopup);
00111     enter->clicked().connect(enter, &Wt::WWidget::disable);
00112     input->enterPressed().connect(boost::bind(&WitreApplication::attributePopup, this));
00113     input->enterPressed().connect(enter, &Wt::WWidget::disable );
00114 
00115     popup = new Goalpopup(this->root());
00116     popup->finished().connect(this, &WitreApplication::clientPostGoal);
00117     popup->finished().connect(enter, &Wt::WPushButton::enable);
00118     popup->cancelled().connect(enter, &Wt::WPushButton::enable);
00119 
00120     timeLineSlider = new Wt::WSlider(Wt::Horizontal, root());
00121     timeLineSlider->setMargin(100, Wt::Left);
00122     //timeLineSlider->setTickPosition(Wt::WSlider::TicksBothSides);
00123     timeLineSlider->setTickInterval(wServer->tickDuration());
00124     timeLineSlider->setRange(0, wServer->getFinalTick());
00125     timeLineSlider->resize(400, 50);
00126     //timeLineSlider->valueChanged().connect(this, &WitreApplication::sliderChanged );
00127     //timeLineSlider->valueChanged().connect(this, &WitreApplication::sliderText);
00128     timeLineSlider->sliderMoved().connect(this, &WitreApplication::sliderText);
00129 
00130     sliderTime = new Wt::WText(root());
00131     new Wt::WBreak(root());
00132     new Wt::WBreak(root());
00133 
00134     observations = wServer->receiveObs();
00135     Wt::WTimer::singleShot(100, this, &WitreApplication::syncObservations); //Calls function after 100mill
00136 
00137     messages = new Wt::WContainerWidget(root());
00138 
00139     //timer = new Wt::WTimer();
00140     //timer->setInterval(1000);
00141     //timer->timeout().connect(this, &WitreApplication::updateTime);
00142     //timer->start();
00143 }
00144 
00145 WitreApplication::~WitreApplication()
00146 {
00147     wServer->disconnect(this);
00148     enableUpdates(false);
00149 }
00150 
00151 void WitreApplication::post()
00152 {
00153     std::string name = observations.front().getObj();
00154     std::string observ = observations.front().getObs();
00155     std::string time = observations.front().getTime();
00156 
00157     if(name=="Tick")
00158     {
00159         updateTick(observ);
00160         observations.pop();
00161         timeLineSlider->setValue(timeLineSlider->value()+1);
00162         sliderText();
00163         Wt::WApplication::instance()->triggerUpdate();
00164         return;
00165     }
00166     Wt::WPanel* panel = new Wt::WPanel();
00167     panel->setCentralWidget(new Wt::WText(observ)); // Addes the most recent observation to webpage
00168     panel->setObjectName(name); // Names the box by the timeline
00169     observations.pop(); //Pops the most recent observation
00170     //box->setCollapsible(true);
00171     //box->setTitleBar(true);
00172     //box->setTitle(tickNum->text());
00173     if(!tLineMap[name])
00174     {
00175         panel->hide();
00176     }
00177     insert(time, panel);
00178 }
00179 
00180 void WitreApplication::insert(std::string time, Wt::WPanel* wid)
00181 {
00182     //const Wt::WAnimation animate(Wt::WAnimation::Fade, Wt::WAnimation::Ease, 10000);
00183     //wid->setAnimation(animate);
00184     if(boxPanels[time]==NULL)
00185     {
00186         Wt::WContainerWidget* temp = new Wt::WContainerWidget();
00187         temp->setObjectName(time);
00188         boxPanels[time]= temp;
00189         messages->insertWidget(0, boxPanels[time]);
00190     }
00191     //messages->insertWidget(0, wid);
00192     boxPanels[time]->insertWidget(0, wid);
00193     Wt::WApplication::instance()->triggerUpdate();
00194 }
00195 
00196 void WitreApplication::updateTime()
00197 {
00198     Wt::WTime* time = new Wt::WTime;
00199     *time = time->currentServerTime();
00200     clock->setText(time->toString());
00201 }
00202 
00203 void WitreApplication::addObs(Observations* temp)
00204 {
00205     observations.push(*temp);
00206     return;
00207 }
00208 
00209 void WitreApplication::timeLineChange()
00210 {
00211     Wt::WObject* timeLine = sender();
00212     std::string tName = timeLine->objectName();
00213     std::map<std::string, Wt::WContainerWidget*>::iterator it;
00214     for(it=boxPanels.begin(); it!=boxPanels.end(); it++)
00215     {
00216         Wt::WContainerWidget* container = (*it).second;
00217         for(int i=0; i<container->count(); i++)
00218         {
00219             Wt::WWidget* tempWidget = container->widget(i);
00220             if(tempWidget->objectName()==tName)
00221             {
00222                 if(tLineMap[tName])
00223                 {
00224                     tempWidget->hide();
00225                 } else {
00226                     tempWidget->show();
00227                 }
00228             }
00229         }
00230     }
00231     // Set the timeline as hidden or show after going through all of the messages
00232     if(tLineMap[tName])
00233     {
00234         tLineMap[tName]=false;
00235     } else {
00236         tLineMap[tName]=true;
00237     }
00238 
00239 }
00240 
00241 void WitreApplication::syncObservations()
00242 {
00243     while(!observations.empty())
00244     {
00245         this->post();
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 void WitreApplication::attributePopup()
00250 {
00251     std::string object = menu->currentText().toUTF8();
00252     std::string predicate = input->text().toUTF8();
00253     if(!object.empty() && !predicate.empty())
00254     {
00255         //popup = new Goalpopup(this->root());
00256         popup->setPosition(input);
00257         popup->valRange(wServer->getCurrentTick(),wServer->getFinalTick());
00258         popup->setVisable();
00259     }
00260     else{
00261         Wt::StandardButton incorrect = Wt::WMessageBox::show("Incorrect", "Invalid input for goal"
00262                                                              , Wt::Ok);
00263         enter->enable();
00264     }
00265 }
00266 
00267 void WitreApplication::clientPostGoal(transaction::IntegerDomain start, transaction::IntegerDomain duration, transaction::IntegerDomain end)
00268 {
00269     std::string object = menu->currentText().toUTF8();
00270     std::string predicate = input->text().toUTF8();
00271     if(!object.empty() && !predicate.empty())
00272     {
00273         TREX::transaction::Goal goal = wServer->getGoal(object,predicate);
00274         goal.restrictStart(start);
00275         goal.restrictDuration(duration);
00276         goal.restrictEnd(end);
00277         TREX::transaction::goal_id goalid = wServer->clientGoalPost(goal);
00278         if(goalid!=NULL)
00279         {
00280             Wt::WPanel* Gpanel = new Wt::WPanel();
00281             Gpanel->setObjectName(goalid->object().str());
00282             //Wt::WPushButton* recall = new Wt::WPushButton("Recall");
00283             std::stringstream oss;
00284             oss<<"On Timeline <b>"<<goalid->object()<<"</b>, placed goal <b>"<<goalid->predicate()<<"</b>"
00285                <<" at the time: "<<wServer->getTime_t()<<"<br />"
00286                <<"Starting: "<<start<<"<br />"
00287                <<"Duration: "<<duration<<"<br />"
00288                <<"End: "<<end<<"<br />";
00289             Wt::WText* text = new Wt::WText(oss.str());
00290             Wt::WContainerWidget* container = new Wt::WContainerWidget;
00291             container->addWidget(text);
00292             //container->addWidget(recall);
00293             //recall->clicked().connect(goalid,&WitreServer::postRecall);
00294             Gpanel->setCentralWidget(container);
00295             if(!tLineMap[goalid->object().str()])
00296             {
00297                 Gpanel->hide();
00298             }
00299             std::stringstream time;
00300             time<<wServer->getCurrentTick();
00301             insert(time.str(), Gpanel);
00302         }
00303 
00304     }
00305     popup->clearText();
00306 
00307 }
00308 
00309 void WitreApplication::sliderChanged()
00310 {
00311     std::stringstream value;
00312     value<<timeLineSlider->value();
00313     std::map<std::string, Wt::WContainerWidget*>::iterator it;
00314     for(it = boxPanels.begin(); it!= boxPanels.end(); it++ )
00315     {
00316         if(boost::lexical_cast<int>((*it).first) > boost::lexical_cast<int>(value.str()))
00317         {
00318             (*it).second->hide();
00319         }
00320         else
00321         {
00322             (*it).second->show();
00323         }
00324     }
00325 }
00326 
00327 void WitreApplication::sliderText()
00328 {
00329     std::stringstream value;
00330     value<<timeLineSlider->value();
00331     sliderTime->setText(value.str());
00332     Wt::WApplication::instance()->triggerUpdate();
00333 }
